channel.title: Installing extensions in Tor browser in Whonix?
channel.description: In whonix WS in virtualbox, I installed imacros extension. Is there a way to check is there some concerns in terms of security?

item.title: Installing extensions in Tor browser in Whonix?
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

For the task of managing passwords, there are actually external programs you may use, a few are listed here: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Dev/Password_Manager

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic
item.source: Installing extensions in Tor browser in Whonix?

item.title: Installing extensions in Tor browser in Whonix?
item.dc:creator: anon556
item.description:
it is inconvenient to type all logins and passwords in every session,
I use imacros to automate this process
is there some other way to shorten the time of login in various sites in tor browser without affecting security?
I am aware this is pseudonymous access. I need to login for example in this forum and number of other sites.

Read full topic
item.source: Installing extensions in Tor browser in Whonix?

item.title: Installing extensions in Tor browser in Whonix?
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

while at the moment there is no way of “checking this”, as browser-fingerprintig-sites are incapable of understanding the way the TBB hides your fingerprint, adding any kind of addon will destroy this kind of security by nature. So yes, this does impact security in a very negative manner.

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic
